questions.question: Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg died  9/18 at the age of 87. Which of the following is NOT part of her legacy

choices.answer: She refused to befriend and work with the conservative justices on the cour
She helped to transform the roles of men and women in society.
She was the second woman to serve on the Supreme Court.

questions.question: Following Justice Ginsburg’s death on Sept. 18, President Trump pressed Senate Republicans to...

choices.answer: confirm his choice to replace Justice Ginsburg “without delay”
support legislation to rename a government building in her honor
pass a bill imposing term limits on Supreme Court justices
wait until after the election to vote on Justice Ginsburg’s replacement

questions.question: The US reached  200,000 people dead from the coronavirus. The U.S. has 4% of the worlds population but _ % of deaths
Who did the Chinese owner of TikTok chose  to be the app’s technology partner for its U.S. operations?
Astronomers have found a potential sign of life in the clouds of which planet long overlooked in the search for life?
What city announced on Sept. 15 that they had reached an agreement to pay Breonna Taylor's family $12 million
At the Emmy awards on Sept. 20, the Canadian sitcom “Schitt’s Creek” became the first show in Emmys history to______  .

choices.answer: Earn more than 10 Emmys in 1 night
win a top prize as a comic book adaptation

questions.question: The Big Ten Conference, one of the wealthiest and most powerful leagues in college sports, announced ___________________

choices.answer: It would cancel all athletic events until 2022
reverse its decision to postpone the 2020 season and play college football
play all games virtually until a vaccine is found
resume all non-team sports in January

questions.question: Michael R. Caputo, a government official made false accusations on Sept. 13, accusing career government scientists of___
Three of the sports-related articles below were published in The New York Times. Which one is fake news?

choices.answer: “A’ja Wilson Wins W.N.B.A.’s Most Valuable Player Award”
“Scientists Study Brains of Baseball Fans to Find Out How They Stay Interes
“Eerily Silent Stadiums Highlight N.F.L.’s Made-for-TV Product”
"Tour de France Crowns Young Champion to Close Its Pandemic Edition”
